T02TD1272E:98a-1: he badzra s+ya she ka ni shtsa ya n'a ma /
T02TD1272E:98a-3: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dbang gtan dbab pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1272E:98a-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1272E:98a-5: dpa' bo shes dang shes bya'i bdag / khyab bdag 'khor lo can btud de //
T02TD1272E:98a-6: chos dbyings shin tu dri med pa //
T02TD1272E:98a-7: dbang gi de nyid mchog bshad bya //
T02TD1272E:98a-8: 'jig rten chos las rnam grol zhing //
T02TD1272E:98a-9: brtse ldan nga rgyal med pa yis //
T02TD1272E:98a-10: sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis ni //
T02TD1272E:98a-11: rgyal bas phyi rol bya ba bstan /
T02TD1272E:98a-12: dkyil 'khor rnams ni ji bzhin du //
T02TD1272E:98a-13: su yis yongs su brtag par nus //
T02TD1272E:98a-14: rang gis lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas //
T02TD1272E:98a-15: grub pa yi ni dkyil 'khor brtag / de ltar yang /
T02TD1272E:98a-16: rdul tshon mchog gis bya ba'am //
T02TD1272E:98a-17: yang na bar ma dag kyang rung //
T02TD1272E:98a-18: rin chen sna lnga'i rang bzhin phye //
T02TD1272E:98a-19: yang na 'bras sogs phye mas so //
T02TD1272E:98a-21: ji ltar 'byor dang rjes mthun par //
T02TD1272E:98a-22: dkyil 'khor dag ni bri byas la //
T02TD1272E:98a-23: nor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1272E:98a-24: nor med bris sku la dbang bskur //
T02TD1272E:98a-25: dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas sngags pa yis //
T02TD1272E:98a-26: bum pa rnams ni lhag gnas bya //
T02TD1272E:98a-27: slob mas pus btsugs thal sbyar nas //
T02TD1272E:98a-28: bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1272E:98b-0: @98b 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba'i bdag / skyabs med khyab bdag nyid kyis skyobs //
T02TD1272E:98b-1: slob ma'i spyi bor lag bzhag nas //
T02TD1272E:98b-2: bla mas sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1272E:98b-3: khro bo'i sa bon snying gar dgod //
T02TD1272E:98b-4: de 'byung khro bo'i tshogs kyis ni //
T02TD1272E:98b-5: slob ma'i sdig pa'i phung po rnams //
T02TD1272E:98b-6: za bzhin par ni bsam par bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-7: lag pas srung skud bcings nas ni //
T02TD1272E:98b-8: so shing yang ni 'cha' ru gzhug / rmi lam shes pa'i rgyu ru ni //
T02TD1272E:98b-9: ku sha'i mal la nyal du gzhug / dge dang mi dge ci mthong ba //
T02TD1272E:98b-10: de bzhin bla ma la ni brjod //
T02TD1272E:98b-11: mi dge na ni zhi bar bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-12: dge na shis so zhes brjod do //
T02TD1272E:98b-13: sdom pa ma lus gzung na ni //
T02TD1272E:98b-14: sngags kyi sku ru bskyed par bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-15: sngags kyis byin brlabs khrag gi ni //
T02TD1272E:98b-16: dpral bar thig le sbyin par bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-18: sbyor bdag rang ni 'jug par bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-19: gos kyis gdong ni g-yogs nas su //
T02TD1272E:98b-20: dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-21: dad pas dkyil 'khor phyag byas te //
T02TD1272E:98b-22: khyad par du yang bla ma la'o //
T02TD1272E:98b-23: bza' bsrung dam tshig ci gsungs pa'i //
T02TD1272E:98b-24: dam tshig de la sbyin par bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-25: de nas bskor ba byas nas ni //
T02TD1272E:98b-26: sbyin pa bzhi ni rab sbyin bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-27: sngags kyis mngon bsngags me tog te //
T02TD1272E:98b-28: dkyil 'khor bzang la gtor bar bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-29: gang du me tog lhung ba yis //
T02TD1272E:98b-30: de yi rigs de shes par bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-31: slob ma'i gdong g-yogs bsal nas ni //
T02TD1272E:98b-32: dkyil 'khor de nyid rab bstan bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-33: phung po skye mched khams rnams kyis //
T02TD1272E:98b-34: rnam dag de bzhin nyid bdag can //
T02TD1272E:98b-35: lha yi rnam pa'i sbyor ba la //
T02TD1272E:98b-36: bu khyod kyis ni sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-37: kun nas bum pa brgyad po yi //
T02TD1272E:98b-38: rang gi rig ma skyes bu'i chu //
T02TD1272E:98b-39: thugs rje'i rdo rje rab bsgoms pas //
T02TD1272E:98b-40: slob ma rdo rje can dbang bskur //
T02TD1272E:98b-41: rdo rje nyi mar rab bsgoms pas //
T02TD1272E:98b-42: de la cod pan sbyin par bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-43: rdo rje'i tshigs bcad rab sbyar ba //
T02TD1272E:98b-44: thams cad sngon bzhin sbyin par bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-45: slob ma'i 'jig rten dbang cha byad //
T02TD1272E:98b-46: rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa //
T02TD1272E:98b-47: nyi shu rtsa brgyad lha ldan pa'i //
T02TD1272E:98b-48: rdo rje dbang gis dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1272E:98b-49: sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni //
T02TD1272E:98b-50: di ring khyod ni dbang bskur te //
T02TD1272E:99a-2: rab bsgrub phyir ni rdo rje gzung //
T02TD1272E:99a-3: slob ma rta yi mchog bsgoms te //
T02TD1272E:99a-4: sgrol ma lhan cig kha ni sbyar //
T02TD1272E:99a-5: rdo rje'i bdag pos dbang bskur te //
T02TD1272E:99a-6: rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD1272E:99a-7: nyi shu rtsa gsum lha yi bdag / dril bus khyod ni dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1272E:99a-8: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD1272E:99a-9: slob ma rnam snang mdzad bsgoms la //
T02TD1272E:99a-10: spyan dang lhan cig kha ni sbyar //
T02TD1272E:99a-11: rdo rje dril bu mgor bzhag ste //
T02TD1272E:99a-12: rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1272E:99a-13: aom badzra sa tva tvam aa bhi shinytsa mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD1272E:99a-14: kye khyod rdo rje che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya'o //
T02TD1272E:99a-15: gang dang gang snang de thams cad //
T02TD1272E:99a-16: de kun sems kyi sprul pa yin //
T02TD1272E:99a-17: chos rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pa //
T02TD1272E:99a-18: sangs rgyas ye shes tshul 'di dang //
T02TD1272E:99a-19: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1272E:99a-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
T02TD1272E:99a-21: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung //
T02TD1272E:99a-22: rdo rje sems dpa'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD1272E:99a-23: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya stvam dha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi h'um /
T02TD1272E:99a-24: sgrub pa kun gyi cho ga dang //
T02TD1272E:99a-25: bla na med pa kun gyis mchod //
T02TD1272E:99a-26: de nas rdo rje lag gis lag / rdo rje brtul zhugs khyod la sbyin //
T02TD1272E:99a-27: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1272E:99a-28: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' chen po //
T02TD1272E:99a-29: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1272E:99a-30: rdo rje snyems pa bdag po'i bdag / shes rab pha rol phyin byung ba //
T02TD1272E:99a-31: dril bu de la sbyin par bya //
T02TD1272E:99a-32: rdo rje dril bu zhes bya bas //
T02TD1272E:99a-33: sems can kun gyi don byed pa //
T02TD1272E:99a-34: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1272E:99a-35: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror gsungs //
T02TD1272E:99a-36: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung //
T02TD1272E:99a-37: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02TD1272E:99a-38: dbugs dbyung thams cad byin nas ni //
T02TD1272E:99a-39: rang nyid sh'akya thub gyur pas //
T02TD1272E:99a-40: de ring slob ma khyod lung bstan //
T02TD1272E:99a-41: sangs rgyas 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
T02TD1272E:99a-42: khyod ni mi 'chi mya ngan med //
T02TD1272E:99a-44: bde chen theg pa 'di las ni //
T02TD1272E:99a-45: bu khyod nga yis lung bstan to //
T02TD1272E:99a-46: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1272E:99a-47: srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD1272E:99a-48: srid pa'i ngan 'gro las ni bton //
T02TD1272E:99b-0: khyod ni lung bstan brjod @99b par bya //
T02TD1272E:99b-1: khyod ni sa stengs mtho ris su //
T02TD1272E:99b-2: dgyes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i //
T02TD1272E:99b-4: rin chen dbang gi dam tshig ni //
T02TD1272E:99b-5: zhes bya bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs //
T02TD1272E:99b-6: rigs mchog lnga las byung ba yis //
T02TD1272E:99b-7: rig ma der ni gzhug par bya //
T02TD1272E:99b-8: yang na gang de ji snyed pa //
T02TD1272E:99b-9: de bzhin lo ni bcu drug pa'o //
T02TD1272E:99b-10: ji srid khu ba ldan gyur par //
T02TD1272E:99b-11: de srid phyag rgya bsten par bya'o //
T02TD1272E:99b-12: phyag rgya'i gdong ni dgab par bya'o //
T02TD1272E:99b-13: thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1272E:99b-14: de bsten pa las gang byung pa //
T02TD1272E:99b-15: mthe bong srin lag dag gis ni //
T02TD1272E:99b-16: slob ma'i khar ni dbab par bya //
T02TD1272E:99b-17: de yis tshigs bcad 'di lta ste //
T02TD1272E:99b-18: ji ltar sangs rgyas 'phags pa yis //
T02TD1272E:99b-19: byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ltar //
T02TD1272E:99b-20: bdag gis gsang ba'i dbang gis ni //
T02TD1272E:99b-21: sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1272E:99b-23: bzhin mdzes mig ni yangs pa dang //
T02TD1272E:99b-24: lang tsho'i gzugs kyis brgyan pa la //
T02TD1272E:99b-25: ting 'dzin yan lag gis skyes pa'i //
T02TD1272E:99b-26: shes rab slob ma la gtad bya //
T02TD1272E:99b-27: de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di'o //
T02TD1272E:99b-28: lha mo dga' ster gnas ster ma //
T02TD1272E:99b-29: sna tshogs gzugs can yid dga' ma //
T02TD1272E:99b-30: zung shig zung shig sems dpa' che //
T02TD1272E:99b-31: bzung nas mchod pa rab tu gyis //
T02TD1272E:99b-32: rang 'dod lha yi sbyor ba dag / shes rab thabs kyi sbyor rig pa //
T02TD1272E:99b-33: shin tu sems ni mnyam gzhag pa'i //
T02TD1272E:99b-34: cho gas phyag rgya mchod par bya //
T02TD1272E:99b-35: shes rab ldan zhing ser sna bral //
T02TD1272E:99b-36: dga' ba'i skad cig nyer longs spyod //
T02TD1272E:99b-37: bla ma la ni btud byas te //
T02TD1272E:99b-38: ji ltar nyams myong brjod par bya //
T02TD1272E:99b-39: dga' ba'i skad cig dbye rig pa'i //
T02TD1272E:99b-40: ston pas de nas lung bstan te //
T02TD1272E:99b-41: sku gsum yongs su shes pa ni //
T02TD1272E:99b-42: shes rab chos nyid bshad kyis nyon //
T02TD1272E:99b-43: ae yig cha byad bzang po gang //
T02TD1272E:99b-44: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1272E:99b-45: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gzhi //
T02TD1272E:99b-46: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma rtog / skad cig dbye bas phye ba yis //
T02TD1272E:99b-47: dga' ba'i skad cig der skye 'gyur //
T02TD1272E:99b-48: skad cig ye shes bde ye shes //
T02TD1272E:99b-49: ae wam rnam par rab tu gnas //
T02TD1272E:100a-2: rnam nyid mtshan nyid bral de bzhin //
T02TD1272E:100a-3: ae wam shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1272E:100a-4: skad cig bzhi la yang dag 'gro //
T02TD1272E:100a-5: sna tshogs rnam pa du mar bshad //
T02TD1272E:100a-7: de las bzlog pa rnam par smin //
T02TD1272E:100a-8: bde ba'i ye shes longs spyod pa'o //
T02TD1272E:100a-9: rnam par nyed par 'gro bar gsungs //
T02TD1272E:100a-10: bdag gis bde ba longs spyod do //
T02TD1272E:100a-11: 'di gsum las gzhan mtshan nyid bral //
T02TD1272E:100a-12: chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs //
T02TD1272E:100a-13: dang po dga' ba sna tshogs te //
T02TD1272E:100a-14: mchog tu dga' ba rnam par smin //
T02TD1272E:100a-15: dga' dang bral ba rnam nyed de //
T02TD1272E:100a-16: lhan cig skyes dga' mtshan nyid bral //
T02TD1272E:100a-17: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang //
T02TD1272E:100a-18: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1272E:100a-19: dbang bzhi'i grangs kyi dbye ba yis //
T02TD1272E:100a-20: dga' ba la sogs rim shes bya //
T02TD1272E:100a-21: de yi phyir ni dga' ba rnams //
T02TD1272E:100a-22: bzhi yi bye brag rab tu phye //
T02TD1272E:100a-23: gang phyir lhan cig skyes rnam bzhi //
T02TD1272E:100a-24: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs yin no //
T02TD1272E:100a-25: dang po dga' ba dpa' bo ste //
T02TD1272E:100a-26: mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1272E:100a-27: shin tu dga' ba mtha' dag nyid //
T02TD1272E:100a-28: bde de'i thabs kyis thams cad rig / cung zad dga' ba bde ba che //
T02TD1272E:100a-29: mchog tu dga' ba de bas lhag / dga' bral dga' ba chags bral yin //
T02TD1272E:100a-30: lhag ma lhan cig skyes dga' ba'o //
T02TD1272E:100a-31: dang por reg par 'dod pa ste //
T02TD1272E:100a-33: gsum pa chags pa spangs pa yin //
T02TD1272E:100a-34: bzhi pa de yis bsgom par bya //
T02TD1272E:100a-35: mchog tu dga' ba srid par gsungs //
T02TD1272E:100a-36: dga' dang bral bas mya ngan 'das //
T02TD1272E:100a-37: dbu ma dga' ba tsam nyid de //
T02TD1272E:100a-38: lhan cig skyes pas 'di rnams spangs //
T02TD1272E:100a-39: mkha' mnyam rdul bral zhi ba ste //
T02TD1272E:100a-40: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog / thabs dang shes rab mnyam 'dres shing //
T02TD1272E:100a-41: chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres //
T02TD1272E:100a-42: de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog / de nyid mchog gi yi ge'o //
T02TD1272E:100a-43: kun la khyab pa'i de nyid 'di //
T02TD1272E:100a-44: lus kun la ni rnam par gnas //
T02TD1272E:100a-45: lte bar gtum mo sbar ba yis //
T02TD1272E:100a-46: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs shing //
T02TD1272E:100b-0: spyan la sogs @100b pa yang bsregs te //
T02TD1272E:100b-1: bsregs pas ri bong can ham 'bab //
T02TD1272E:100b-2: ko l+la ai re tthi aa bo la /
T02TD1272E:100b-4: gha na kri pi ta ho b'adzdza ai /
T02TD1272E:100b-5: ka ru ni ki aa ai na ro l'a /
T02TD1272E:100b-6: ta him ba la kh'adzdza ai /
T02TD1272E:100b-7: g'a dhem ma aa n'a bidzdza ai /
T02TD1272E:100b-8: ha le k'a linydza ra pa ni aa ai /
T02TD1272E:100b-10: tsa au sa ma ka sthu ri sihl'a /
T02TD1272E:100b-11: k'a sbu ra l'a ai aa ai /
T02TD1272E:100b-12: m'a la aindha na sh'a linydza ta him /
T02TD1272E:100b-14: phrem kha na kha ta ka rante /
T02TD1272E:100b-15: shuddha aa shuddha na mu ni aa ai /
T02TD1272E:100b-16: ni ram su aam ge tsa d'a wi /
T02TD1272E:100b-17: ta hi dza sa r'a wa pa ni aa ai /
T02TD1272E:100b-18: m'a la aa dze kun du ru p'a ta ai /
T02TD1272E:100b-19: dinda ma ta hinna b'adzdza aa ai /
T02TD1272E:100b-20: gang phyir bde chen thos gnas pas //
T02TD1272E:100b-21: bde chen 'khor lo phal chen po'o //
T02TD1272E:100b-23: bde des bsam gtan zhes su brjod //
T02TD1272E:100b-24: bde ba chen por ba thob na //
T02TD1272E:100b-25: sna tshogs pa yis skad cig spong //
T02TD1272E:100b-26: bde ba chen po gzung bya zhes //
T02TD1272E:100b-27: sems dpa' che la bla ma gsung //
T02TD1272E:100b-28: ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing //
T02TD1272E:100b-29: rdo rje snying po mkha' dang mtshungs //
T02TD1272E:100b-30: rdul bral thar pa ster zhi ba //
T02TD1272E:100b-31: khyod kyi pha ni khyod rang yin //
T02TD1272E:100b-32: shes rab ye shes kyi mngon par byang chub pa'o //
T02TD1272E:100b-33: chags sogs rol mo 'dir ma bshad //
T02TD1272E:100b-34: yang bdag med mas gsol ba /
T02TD1272E:100b-35: dge slong dge slong ma rgan po //
T02TD1272E:100b-36: de bzhin ma ning la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1272E:100b-38: bcom ldan bdag la bshad du gsol //
T02TD1272E:100b-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02TD1272E:100b-40: ji ltar sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02TD1272E:100b-41: slob dpon gyis ni phun tshogs sbyin //
T02TD1272E:100b-42: dga' 'bral dang po mchog gi mtha' //
T02TD1272E:100b-43: de nas ye shes bsten par bya //
T02TD1272E:100b-44: rang gi lag pa g-yas g-yon gyi //
T02TD1272E:100b-45: mthe bong srin lag dag gis ni //
T02TD1272E:100b-46: longs spyod kyi ni dba' rlabs gnyis //
T02TD1272E:100b-47: rnal 'byor pa yis gnan par bya //
T02TD1272E:100b-48: de las skyes pa'i ye shes ni //
T02TD1272E:100b-49: dper na gzhon nu ma chags bzhin //
T02TD1272E:100b-50: nyams su myong ba'i ye shes 'di //
T02TD1272E:100b-51: tshig gi spyod yul ga la yin //
T02TD1272E:100b-52: de la thog mtha' dbu ma med //
T02TD1272E:100b-53: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa min //
T02TD1272E:100b-54: bdag med gzhan yang med pa ste //
T02TD1272E:100b-55: 'di ni mchog tu bde chen yin //
T02TD1272E:101a-1: mtha' mar 'khor ba'i gzugs can ma //
T02TD1272E:101a-2: dbu mar rdul bral zhi ba ni //
T02TD1272E:101a-3: khyab bdag dngos dang dngos med zad //
T02TD1272E:101a-4: chos kyi dbyings kyi mngon par byang chub pa'o //
T02TD1272E:101a-5: sems can mos pa sna tshogs la //
T02TD1272E:101a-6: phan par 'jug pa'i dbye ba yis //
T02TD1272E:101a-7: rdo rje 'dzin chen thabs bdag gis //
T02TD1272E:101a-8: sgrub thabs du ma gsungs pa yin //
T02TD1272E:101a-9: sngags kyi tshul ni rjes sbas pa //
T02TD1272E:101a-11: shin tu bla ma la gus pa'i //
T02TD1272E:101a-12: dang ldan skyes bu la bshad bya //
T02TD1272E:101a-13: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud dgyes pa'i rdo rje las btus pa'i dbang rnam par gtan la dbab pa slob dpon chen pa dgra las rgyal bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1272E:101a-15: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i g-ya dha ra dang /
T02TD1272E:101a-16: bod kyi lo ts'a ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
